problems.title: GCD of an Array
problems.description:
You are given an array of N positive integers. Your task is to find the greatest common divisor (GCD) of all the numbers in the array.

Input Format:
The first line contains a single integer N.
The second line contains N space-separated integers a1, a2, ..., aN.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the GCD of all array elements.
hintsList: Start with g = a1, then update g = gcd(g, ai) for each element. At the end, g is the GCD of the whole array.
